name: Still Reloading
description:
How long can you survive in a room full of zombies?

How long do you think it would be if you had to manually load your gun 1 bullet at a time?

Now how about if your bullets bounce off everything? Except you.

Still Reloading is a Top-Down Twin Stick Shooter where the only goal is survival.

Uses Xbox1 and Playstation 4 controllers.
